name: Mindscape Mayhem
description:
It's all in your head

Battle against your inner demon and show that you're impervious to its influence in this short but challenging shoot 'em up game.

Programming, art, and music all done by me.

Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Arrow Keys + X - Dash
  • C - Shoot
  • Z - Shoot plasma
  • Space - Shoot burst
  • Tab - Pause (in battle)
